title: It would be nice if Riot stopped this "everybody should be around 50% win rate"
body:
It's evident to me , after playing for 8 seasons and having changed servers, that when someone gets more wins than losses, at some point the system matches him with really lower teammates. That is the idea of a competitive game, that Riot has for league of legends.
I know that you have a business to run and make money, but frustrating the players is a shameful thing to do. If someone gets a high win rate, just match him with better teammates and better opponents. There is no need to "punish" him. 
E.G. Don't tell me that the above doesn't happen. It's a fact, 5 different people monitor it.

replies.body:
The system does not.

As you win, you get matched with better players.Typically you advance faster than your ability to handle those players, or your own higher MMR is skewing matchmaking.
